item.title: Ora add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Ora add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else's life with perfection." -- Anonymous

item.title: Ora add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Never forget that once upon a time, in an unguarded moment, you recognized yourself as a friend." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description:
"I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Life is pure adventure, and the sooner we realize that, the quicker we will be able to treat life as art." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There's a world of difference between truth and facts. Facts can obscure truth." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform a million realities." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Poetry puts starch in your backbone so you can stand, so you can compose your life." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "We are all human; therefore, nothing human can be alien to us." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You dwell in whitened castles with deep and poisoned moats and cannot hear the curses which fill your children's throats." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Words mean more than what is set down on paper. It takes the human voice to infuse them with shades of deeper meaning." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Ora add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
